code:
%% Connection flowchart
flowchart TD
  subgraph Client[Infra_WorkerNode]
    C1[Infra_RedisCache]
    C2[Infra_IngressController]
    C3[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    C4[Infra_EtcdCluster]
    C5[Infra_LoadBalancer]
  end

  subgraph Server[Infra_WorkerNode]
    S1[Infra_IngressController]
    S2{Infra_LoadBalancer}
    S3[Infra_LoadBalancer]
    S4[Infra_IngressController]
    S5[Infra_RedisCache]
    S6[Infra_RedisCache]
  end

  C1 --> C2 --> C3 --> S1
  S1 -->|invalid| Drop[Infra_LoadBalancer]
  S1 --> S2
  S2 -- yes --> S3 --> S4 --> C5
  S2 -- no --> S5

  C5 -- piggyback --> S1
  C5 -- no_outgoing --> ExplicitACK[Infra_LoadBalancer] --> S1
  C4 --> C3

  S6 --> Close[Infra_LoadBalancer]
